text: Hey Everyone. Is there any endpoint to search for a contact In a contact list . Or any way to get in which contact lists a specific contact exist?

Hello,
Is this possible to use custom backend node modules on HubSpot? Like Hapi? Express?
Hi everyone.  Trying to use /crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/update set a value single property for multiple contacts.  How do you set id for multiple contacts?  I space separated and comma separated.
NM I think I see it.  Need to create an array of inputs.

For CMS based development or with serverless functions, you can develop locally and then use tools like webpack to package any node modules into the JS portion of a HubSpot CMS module or into your function. There's some existing boilerplate that can help - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/js-frameworks> or <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions/reference#how-to-include-other-packages>

If you're asking mostly about using the HubSpot REST APIs or if HubSpot can host a backend application, then no, this is not possible

Hey, guys! Is there any way to get all the custom behavioral event properties by API or whatever?
Cause I need to create a workflow based on ALL the page views timestamps, but I only got it from the contacts and not from the anonymous visitors.
Could you please help me to figure it out? Thank youuuuu!!
